fields.name: Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_generalHeader
fields.fieldText: MONEY LAUNDERING RISK ASSESSMENT

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_yesno
fields.fieldText: YES / NO / N/A (for Law)

fields.name: mlra1
fields.fieldText: Is the business structure complex/unusual?

fields.name: mlra2
fields.fieldText:
Does the client transact with businesses in overseas countries with weak money laundering regimes?


Annex_C_-_FATF_Advisory_Notice_on_Outcomes_-_October_2022.pdf (publishing.service.gov.uk)


High-risk third countries for AML purposes | The Law Society

fields.name: mlra3
fields.fieldText: Is control remote?

fields.name: mlra4
fields.fieldText: Is it a cash business?

fields.name: mlra5
fields.fieldText: Do we have any concerns over the source of the client’s funds?

fields.name: mlra6
fields.fieldText: ﻿Does the client hold monies for its clients/customers?

fields.name: mlra7
fields.fieldText: Do we anticipate holding monies for the client?

fields.name: mlraWarning
fields.fieldText: A “Yes” answer to ANY of the above means the client must be treated as high risk

fields.name: mlra8
fields.fieldText:
Have we met the client face to face?

﻿If “No” the client must be treated as high risk

fields.name: mlra9
fields.fieldText: If the client has been met please state which team member met them:

fields.name: mlra10
fields.fieldText: Please name the individuals whom we met:

fields.name: mlra11
fields.fieldText: Other comments:

fields.name: mlra12
fields.fieldText: Is the client a Politically Exposed Person (PEP)?

fields.name: mlra13
fields.fieldText: Are any family members or close associates of the client PEPs?

fields.name: mlraWarning2
fields.fieldText:
A “Yes” answer to either of the above means the client must be treated as high risk and Enhanced Due Diligence (EDD) procedures as set out in the firm’s Client Acceptance Guidance Notes (available on the intranet) applied. 

Record EDD procedures undertaken below:

fields.name: mlra15
fields.fieldText: Considering the above factors, the risk of money laundering is:

fields.name: mlraWarning3
fields.fieldText:
THE LEVEL OF MONEY LAUNDERING RISK ASSESSED WILL BE INPUT INTO DYNAMICS BY THE COMPLIANCE TEAM

 

BENEFICIAL OWNERSHIP AND ID VERIFICATION:

 

Please ensure that all SmartSearches are processed as ‘HIGH’ risk unless we have physically met the beneficial owners.

 

Normal Risk:  SmartSearch check (“Normal” risk setting) OR one government issued document with photo e.g., passport or driving licence;

 

High Risk:      SmartSearch check (“High” risk setting);

OR

One government issued document with photo e.g., passport or driving licence AND document detailing address e.g., utility bill.

 

Note:               For passport identification provided for overseas personnel, a SmartSearch must be actioned to verify the passport identification.

This enables the Sanctions list to be kept up to date from a Politically Exposed Person (PEP) perspective.

 

We need to find out who ALL the owners of the client are (the most recent confirmation statement alone may NOT achieve this, and earlier confirmation statements or annual returns may be needed). 

 

Then we must determine whether there are any beneficial owners (see Client Acceptance Guidance Notes) and record the basis of their beneficial ownership below:

fields.name: orpick1yes
fields.fieldText: If yes, please detail below why you are happy to proceed:

fields.name: orpick2yes
fields.fieldText: If yes, why?

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_headerTxt1
fields.fieldText: ﻿Business Risk Assessment

fields.name: Copy_1_of_beneficiariesHeader
fields.fieldText: OBJECTIVITY / CONFLICTS OF INTEREST ETC.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_YESNO3
fields.fieldText: YES/NO/N/A (for Law)

fields.name: obj1
fields.fieldText: Do we already act for any parties involved or have we acted in the past?

fields.name: objpickyes1
fields.fieldText: If yes, please give details below:

fields.name: obj3
fields.fieldText: Are there any other relationships or other issues which may threaten our objectivity or could be perceived to do so?

fields.name: obj4
fields.fieldText: Are we involved in any dispute with any party?

fields.name: obj5
fields.fieldText: Have potential conflicts been identified for any other reason?

fields.name: obj6
fields.fieldText: (If applicable) Is the level of fees likely to affect audit independence?

fields.name: obj7
fields.fieldText: Considering all the above, have we identified significant personal or professional relationships or conflicts of interest which could threaten our objectivity or be seen to do so?

fields.name: objpickyes7
fields.fieldText: If yes, please summarise below.

fields.name: obj8
fields.fieldText: Can safeguards be implemented which will reduce the threat(s) to an acceptable level?

fields.name: objpickyes8
fields.fieldText: If yes, please describe below:

fields.name: objwarn1
fields.fieldText:
SEE EXAMPLE WORDING - PLEASE DELETE WHERE APPLICABLE:

 

AUDIT AND TAX

Ø Tax work will be carried out by a team independent of the audit team and under the supervision of a separate Partner

 

ACCOUNTS AND AUDIT WORK

Ø Producing statutory accounts in our accounting software which only involve services of a routine or mechanical nature.

Ø We will not initiate transactions or carry out any accounting services that would involve us undertaking any part in the role of management.

Ø We should include safeguards to ensure that we do not carry out any more in the preparation of statutory accounting services other than the above. Either a separate team inputting into CaseWare or 2nd Partner review.

 

NFP

AAR / TPS EOYC - other non-audit services expected to be completed by auditor as part of role and are separate from the audit process.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_headerTxt1

fields.fieldText: ADDITIONAL COMMENTS:

fields.name: Copy_1_of_objwarn1
fields.fieldText:
RELATIONSHIP PARTNER APPROVALS:

 

Ø I am satisfied that we should accept the appointment / assignment and that the relevant risks have been satisfactorily investigated.

 

Ø I confirm that satisfactory evidence of the client’s identity has been obtained to comply with the money laundering regulations.
